title: Large-Scale Intensive Short-Term Programming Fundamentals Course Based on Cognitive Load Theory

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and logical reasoning skills
context.additional_context: Strengthening Foundational Programming Competencies for Current Practitioners to Enhance Work Efficiency

learning_goals: Learners can write simple pseudocode using three programming constructs (variables, conditionals, loops) with 90% accuracy.
Learners can apply debugging techniques with 80% or higher accuracy through example-based learning.
Learners can explain 80% or more of the problem-solving process for programming tasks using self-explanation strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
